name: Fragrite
description: The Fragrite embodies the essence of sand and glass, capable of shifting forms between a mass of sand or a glass humanoid.
memorable: Its unique shapechanging ability provides both offensive and evasive tactics, making it an unpredictable opponent.
goals: To control the battlefield and evade attacks while posing a significant threat to adventurers.
relations: May encounter other elemental creatures or serve powerful beings in sandy or desert environments.
environment: Typically found in sandy areas or regions with abundant glass, such as deserts or beaches.
strengths: Immunity to poison damage and several conditions, as well as the ability to evade attacks and control combat.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to thunder damage while in glass form.
attacks: Employs melee strikes that can deal bludgeoning damage, becoming slashing damage when wounded in glass form.
most_powerful_ability: Spontaneous Explosion: allows it to cause significant damage to nearby enemies while changing back to sand form.
additional_information: Resists fire, lightning, and nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.
Has a burrow speed of 50 feet in sand form, enhancing mobility.
Gains advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks in sandy terrain.
Immune to being grappled while in sand form.
Can make two attacks each turn, providing consistent offensive pressure.
test_queries: elemental with sand and glass forms
chaotic neutral elemental with evasive abilities
creature immune to poison and status effects
desert elemental that changes shapes in battle
